alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 3:49PM EDT until September 08 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Columbia County in east central New York... Southern Rensselaer County in east central New York... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 349 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Baltimore, or 7 miles southwest of Nassau, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nassau, Stephentown, New Lebanon, Valatie, Castleton-On-Hudson, Kinderhook, Averill Park, West Sand Lake, Sand Lake, Coeymans, Stuyvesant, East Nassau, Brookview, Van Hoesen Station, West Stephentown, Jacks Corners, Millers Corners, Rayville, Riders Mills and Taborton. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
